caption: In 2010, Kirsten consulted for Fountain People to lead the Scenic Paint Efforts for the Nemo Splash Pad for the Disney Cruise Line’s ships. Kirsten painted the Dory and Marlin figures, coral set pieces and a mural on the ship’s walls. PPG high performance polyurethane clearcoat protected these items from water, weather and guest interaction.
alt: Disney Cruiseline Dory for Nemo Splashpad

caption: Pictured is the Nemo Splash Pad on Disney “Dream”. Kirsten painted figures and coral set pieces and a 100 foot mural in Interfine 679 polysiloxane industrial catalyzed paint.
Kirsten assisted with painting the Hong Kong Disneyland Main Sphere of the Orbitron using PPG Chrome Illusion Color Shift base coat and clearcoat.
Detail: Orbitron paint system and color-shifting metallics with high gloss clearcoat.
alt: Hong Kong Disney Land Orbitron Paint

caption: Kirsten supervised installation paint of the Play Doh Lid using Dupont Imron 5000 colors and 6000 clearcoat.
Play Doh Lid install — site installation photo.
Popcorn removal — not one of Kirsten’s favorite jobs.
